title: Enhancing e-Learning Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Social Job Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners complete pre-learning content (videos, readings) at least 90% of the time twice weekly in a flipped learning environment.
Learners perform social conflict resolution scenarios through VR simulation with 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve 2.5 or higher on a 3-point rubric in their ability to create self-directed learning plans through formative assessments.
Learners participate at least once a week in peer feedback-based online discussions, enhancing their collaborative social skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
